content:
Prev: Victoria Glacier Valley, IV Up: Banff Next: Sanson Peak

Lake Louise Lodge



The view of the lodge was a bit spoiled by the ski runs behind it, unfortunately. About a dozen hikers can be seen scattered along the shore to the left of the lodge.
Taken Wednesday, August 19, 2009, 01:51:18PM. Original image size: 3036x2429, 1.6Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/125s@ F11, ISO 100, 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS, 68mm (108mm equiv)
PS CS2 -0.35:5:50:-25:50, Crop, USM 20:200 20:2, Burn bg
